title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin takes a shocking turn by praising Russell Westbrook for the Lakers win over the Heat but points out his limitations as a super star in the NBA. He explains why the Patrick Mahomes and the Chiefs offense need to change their identity to extend their Super Bowl window like other great dynasties. He believes this team in the NFL needs to move on from their starter and transition their young franchise quarterback. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to give his analysis on Baker Mayfield without Odell Beckham Jr. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
